en.title: Yemen Immigration & Passport Services Platform
en.text: A digital platform in Yemen that provides immigration and passport services online. It simplifies the process of applying for passports, visa requests, residency permits, and allows applicants to track their requests with real-time status updates.

en.title: Mahasil Platform for Farmers
en.text: A digital platform designed to help farmers manage their farms, showcase their products, and participate in agricultural events. Farmers can post products for sale, announce participation in events like vegetable or livestock exhibitions, and get high-priority advertisements. The platform also includes real-time notifications, messaging tools, and an analytics dashboard to optimize farm management.
fea: High-priority advertisements for selected products or events
Real-time notifications for new events and sales
Farmer dashboard with analytics and messaging tools
Admin panel for approvals and content management
